meanings.sent1: The antimalaria medication helped protect the travelers from getting sick.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend using antimalaria products in regions where malaria is common.
meanings.sent3: The antimalaria spray was so effective that even the mosquitoes avoided the area.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude acted as an antimalaria shield against negativity.
meanings.sent5: The antimalaria vaccine created a strong barrier against the disease.

meanings.definition: A substance used to prevent or treat malaria.
meanings.sent1: The clinic stocked up on antimalaria for the upcoming malaria season.
meanings.sent2: She always carried antimalaria pills when traveling to tropical countries.
meanings.sent3: The ants mistakenly thought the antimalaria tablets were sugar cubes.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was like an antimalaria, protecting those around him from harm.
meanings.sent5: The antimalaria supply was crucial in the fight against the disease outbreak.
